metadata.name: Liberty Torch
metadata.description:
The Liberty Torch NFT is a highlighted segment of the original, almost 10-story (90’x30’), *‘CityKids Speak on Liberty’* artwork created in 1986 by Keith Haring and [The CityKids Foundation](https://www.citykids.com/), in collaboration with over 1000 high school students from across all 5 NYC boroughs. 

Each NFT owner will be granted access to the [GoodArtDAO](https://goodartdao.org/), a global community focused on empowering the next generation of thinkers, activists, and builders around the world while tackling issues such as mental health, economic inequality, racism, tech poverty, and climate.

Keith Haring’s legacy of youth empowerment is our core inspiration as we embark on our journey to create more monumental artworks that revitalize our youth’s focus on liberty and freedom.

Join us as we create a multicultural safe space for all and continue to keep the Liberty Torch alight. Learn more at [https://speakonliberty.com](https://speakonliberty.com)

*[NFT License]([https://goodartdao.org/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/GOODART-NFT-purchase-agreement.docx.pdf](https://goodartdao.org/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/GOODART-NFT-purchase-agreement.docx.pdf)*
